name: Five Nights in Paradise
short_description: Stay a while in paradise and truly indulge! Save 25% on stays of at least 5 nights.
short_description_detail_page: A resort this indulgent calls for time to truly savor it. When you stay 5 consecutive nights or more at Oceans Edge, youâ€™ll save 25% and receive 2 welcome cocktails. Cheers to vacation!
description:
Book this offer and enjoy:

  • Tropically inspired elegant accommodations
  • 2 welcome cocktails
  • Complimentary 2-hour kayak, paddleboard, or bicycle rental
  • Shuttle service to Key West Historic Seaport (eowntown)
  • Personalized in-room entertainment via 49-inch Smart TV
  • Access to Digital Concierge services
  • Access to complimentary resort activities, 24-hour gym, and lawn games
  • Access to 6 heated pristine pools with poolside refreshment service
  • Access to a deep-water full marina with a variety of water activities
terms_conditions: Stay must include at least 5 consecutive nights. Daily rates are subject to taxes, fees, and nightly resort fee of $37 plus tax. on-site parking is available for $20 per night plus tax per vehicle and parking space required. Restrictions and blackout dates may apply.
